content: **this pattern is available free here 1 when signing up for the creative crochet corner newsletter the maize beanie was part of a live craftsy tutorial and the replay can be watched for free over here on craftsy 2 ** this project is super fast *and* super fun see how a variation of a half-double_crochet stitch can create a warm textured stretchy fabric with a surprising amount of drape- even in a super bulky yarn 1 http //go creativecrochetcorner com/a33131/ 2 https //www craftsy com/post/craftsgiving-maize-beanie/#
